attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.desc: Every morning, teachers take attendance of their students during assembly and homeroom.

print.title: {{date, datetime(day: numeric; month: short)}} Attendance Summary
print.subtitle: Presented by MySK

chart.note: Chart guide: each group is a grade, including data during assembly (top) and homeroom (bottom). Late is pink, presence is blue, and absence is red.

participation.title: Participation
participation.desc: Metrics on students and teachers participation in using the MySK infrastructure.

awareness.alt: Users who have logged in at least once
awareness.title: {{percentage, number(style: percent;)}} of all users have logged in at least once
awareness.subtitle: {{count, number}} out of {{total, number}} registered users

teacherParticipation.title: {{percentage, number(style: percent;)}} of all teachers have filled in their schedule
teacherParticipation.subtitle: {{count, number}} out of {{total, number}} registered teachers

studentParticipation.title: {{percentage, number(style: percent;)}} of all students have filled in additional account information
studentParticipation.subtitle: {{count, number}} out of {{total, number}} student with an assigned classrooms
